t: Amazon.com : City Color Cosmetics Contour Effects Palette : Beauty & Personal Care
s: True matte contour and bronzer shades work with all skin tones and blend to a seamless shadow. Add a glowing radiance and lift your cheekbones with the shimmer highlight. This velvety smooth formula is a pressed fine powder that allows for light application with serious color payoff.
